function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of the virus due to resistance to shut down economic activity","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher infection rates, and potential overload of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implement strict guidelines for social distancing, mask-wearing, and hygiene practices. Provide financial support to enable people to stay home.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, and air filtration systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, businesses"},{"Description":"Division between cautious and aggressive approaches to economic activity","Impact":"Differences in virus containment measures and responses, leading to uneven infection rates and potential cross-border spread","Mitigation":"International cooperation and communication to align containment strategies. Sharing of resources and best practices among countries.","Technologies":"Video conferencing, real-time data sharing platforms, and collaborative decision-making tools","People":"Government leaders, policymakers, international organizations","Owner":"International organizations, government leaders, policymakers"},{"Description":"Resistance to taking action against climate change","Impact":"Missed opportunity to address environmental concerns, leading to prolonged environmental degradation and health risks","Mitigation":"Educate and advocate for sustainable practices and policies. Incentivize green initiatives and investments in renewable energy.","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, environmental monitoring systems, and carbon footprint tracking tools","People":"Global population, future generations, environmental activists","Owner":"Environmental organizations, governments, businesses"}]}
